medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and RUQ abdominal pain associated with nausea and bloating.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 month ago with bloating and increased gas, with a 1-day history of epigastric/RUQ abdominal pain that started the day prior to presentation. Pain extends from the epigastrium to the RUQ and radiates to the back. Patient has been unable to tolerate oral intake. No previous episodes of pain noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CHF, GERD, low back pain, sciatica, fibromyalgia, hypertension, candidal intertrigo, appendectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother and sister with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus; mother and aunt with cancer.
